column3: Confirm all valve switches are in OFF position (Except OxDV & HPDV)
Confirm all valve switches are in OFF position (Except RMOxSV)
Open & Close OxDV STEPWISE until OxOutPT 0 Bar
Confirm ROxTPT & RHPPT 1 Bar, if more: Open & Close stepwise RDV
Wait for Launchpad to be clear of N2O fumes depending on OxMass before Defueling
BEGIN SEQUENCE: Ground support equipment passivation
Close N2O Bottle 1 & N2O Bottle 2, THEN...
Take out Bridges B1 & B2 from EGSE, THEN...
Go to MRL, confirm OxInPG1 & OxInPG2 0 Bar, else RETURN to Block House, THEN...
Write down remaining Pressure of He Bottle 2, THEN...
Go to Testrig, confirm HPPG2 0 Bar, else return to Block House, THEN...
Remove HP section maintenance cover, THEN...
Open RMDV & Step Back, Wait until NCE-Tank is pressureless, THEN...
Write down remaining Pressure of He Bottle 1
Check and compare pressure HPPT1 with HPPG1
Confirm EPS RADIO SILENCE Bridge (3R) and BLACKBOX2 RADIO SILENCE Bridge (6R) are inserted
Confirm ALL 8 bridges on the left side are removed
Confirm to OPS that Safety is ensured
Turn off GoPro & Camcorder & Stop Block House Video recording
Copy PID.vi.tdms & save to new name
Wait for buffer storage process to be finished
save data files from cRio to PC
Stop TMTC Vi and save data on external HDD
Stop ComTerm and save logfile to external HDD, THEN...
Save video & audio data on external HDD
